title: Employee Attrition Prediction
description: Predicts whether an employee will leave using HR analytics data (IBM HR Analytics Employee Attrition Dataset). Key factors: job satisfaction, monthly income, age, department, and work-life balance.
notes: Employees with low job satisfaction or low monthly income are more likely to leave. Younger employees show higher attrition.

title: Credit Card Anomaly Detection
description: Detects potential fraudulent credit card transactions using Isolation Forest. Dataset contains anonymized features (V1..V28), Time, Amount, and Class.
notes: Anomaly detector tuned for high recall on fraudulent cases while keeping false positives low.
